city.name: Shenzhen
city.park: The "Window of the World" Theme Park
city.parkDescr: One of Shenzhen’s most famous parks, featuring miniature versions of world-famous landmarks like the Eiffel Tower and the Great Wall of China. It also includes attractions and cultural shows.
city.villageDescr: A theme park that combines miniature replicas of famous Chinese landmarks with displays of traditional Chinese culture and folk art.
city.beiDescr: A well-known district with high-tech and electronics centers. It’s a great place to buy gadgets and electronics at competitive prices.
city.mountainDescr: A park and mountain area in the center of Shenzhen, where you can climb to the top and enjoy panoramic views of the city.
city.areaDescr: A bustling commercial district where you can find various goods, from clothing to street food. A great place for shopping and experiencing local cuisine.
city.tower: The Ping An Tower Observation Deck
city.towerDescr: A high-rise tower with observation decks offering spectacular views of the city and surrounding areas.
